constituent: plank, tree, wood, anti-, demonstration, cliff, crotch
koohiiStory1: Of course, trees are anti-plank. Wouldn´t you be if you were a tree?
koohiiStory2: Trees are naturally opposed to, or anti, the making of planks.
myStory: tấm. miếng. đĩa. cây chống lại là đĩa
readingExamples: 乾板 (かんばん), 鉄板 (てっぱん), 板 (いた)
words: sign, signboard, doorplate, poster, billboard, appearance, figurehead, policy, attraction, closing time
